    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String maskBankAccountNumber(String val)
      Masks all but the last three digits of a given bank account number. If the number has four digits or less, the entire account number is masked.
      static String maskString(String val, int maskLen, int numVis)
      static String maskTaxId(String val)
      Masks the first five digits of a given Tax ID. This method only applies if the Tax ID is of the US format xxx-xx-xxxx -- any other input is invalid (in addition the field validators on TaxID input fields will enforce this). If another format is defined and used, you must create your own masking function.

      • Methods inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
